RepairHim.en: Looks like they needs some parts... Maybe I can find them.

PartsFound.en: Now just to find a battery...

Futility.en: I can't find one. I should give them mine... to give them a chance to live.

SecondChance.en: This is a second chance I didn't think I'd have to see the world.

Why.en: Why am I still alive? I should give them my battery...

Reunion.en: You came back. Let's leave together this time.
